metadata.title: We Love You.       Explicit Lyrics
description: The limited-edition version of this CD comes with USB jewelry containing the band's videos, wallpaper, images, and digital booklet! The 500MB USB storage device is re-usable and can be loaded with user data.

The Brooklyn quartet's debut album, We Love You is all that and more: Ten soulful, sleazy, celebratory tunes that rock as hard and stylishly as Justin Tranter swaggers as the Semi Precious Weapons frontman. "Musically, there's a little more cock rock than what people think of when they think of glam," says Justin. "It's raucous, hypersexual, easy-to-sing-along-to rock `n' roll."
